name: ConfigurationOptions
comment:
Various settings for controlling the input and output of a {@link
 Configuration}

methods.name: configuration
methods.comment: Returns the {@link Configuration} that this object is responsible for.

methods.name: pathSeparator
methods.comment:
Gets the char that will be used to separate {@link ConfigurationSection}s

This value does not affect how the {@link Configuration} is stored, only in how you access the data. The default value is '.'.

methods.name: pathSeparator
methods.comment:
Sets the char that will be used to separate {@link ConfigurationSection}s

This value does not affect how the {@link Configuration} is stored, only in how you access the data. The default value is '.'.

methods.name: copyDefaults
methods.comment:
Checks if the {@link Configuration} should copy values from its default {@link Configuration} directly.

If this is true, all values in the default Configuration will be directly copied, making it impossible to distinguish between values that were set and values that are provided by default. As a result, {@link ConfigurationSection#contains(java.lang.String)} will always return the same value as {@link ConfigurationSection#isSet(java.lang.String)}. The default value is false.

methods.name: copyDefaults
methods.comment:
Sets if the {@link Configuration} should copy values from its default {@link Configuration} directly.

If this is true, all values in the default Configuration will be directly copied, making it impossible to distinguish between values that were set and values that are provided by default. As a result, {@link ConfigurationSection#contains(java.lang.String)} will always return the same value as {@link ConfigurationSection#isSet(java.lang.String)}. The default value is false.
